projects.title: Change Project Name
projects.description: A powerful CLI tool to rename Flutter/Dart projects and automatically update all package references, and imports.

projects.title: Cosmic App KIOSK Touchscreen
projects.description: Enhanced and maintained a KIOSK touchscreen application for the Bureau of Publishing (DPR RI). Refactored the codebase to improve readability, maintainability, and code quality. Implemented device power scheduling feature using Android's AlarmManager and auto-return mechanism that resets WebView to the base URL after inactivity.

projects.title: Quraani - Quran Mobile App
projects.description: Simple and easy-to-use Quran app for Android built with Flutter. It is a project that aims to provide a clean and simple interface for reading the Quran. The app is designed to be fast, lightweight, and easy to use. Quraani is a mobile application built with Flutter that allows users to conveniently access and interact with the Quran while on the go.

projects.title: E-Market Seller Mobile Applications
projects.description: E-Market Seller mobile application is designed for sellers who want to sell their products online, specifically catering to the needs of UMKM (Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises) located in Kecamatan Malingping.

projects.title: E-Market Buyer Mobile Applications
projects.description: E-Market Buyer mobile application aims to provide a convenient platform for buyers in Kecamatan Malingping to browse and purchase products online. By focusing on this specific user group, the application takes into account the unique preferences and requirements of buyers in Kecamatan Malingping, offering tailored features and functionalities to enhance their shopping experience.

projects.title: Get Wallpaper
projects.description: Get Wallpaper is a mobile application built using Flutter. It allows users to browse, download, and set wallpapers from the internet. The application fetches wallpaper data from an external API and displays it in a user-friendly interface.
